casebody.data:
Argued and submitted June 19, 2000, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. DAVID ALAN DRAKE, Appellant. (980948520; CA A106174) 21 P3d 660 Laura S. Anderson, Assistant Attorney General, argued the cause for respondent. With her on the brief were Hardy Myers, Attorney General, and Michael D. Reynolds, Solicitor General. Before Linder, Presiding Judge, and Brewer, Judge, and Ceniceros, Senior Judge. PER CURIAM

reversed and remanded for new trial March 21, 2001

Garrett A. Richardson argued the cause and filed the brief for appellant.
